Package org.wso2.carbon.repository

Interface Summary
Collection The Collection Interface.
Comment Deprecated. This will removed from carbon kernel as this is a social aspect and not part of a pure repository This interface represents a comment that can be added to a resource.
Registry This is the "Full" Registry interface.
RegistryService This interface can be used to implement an OSGi Service of the Repository.
Resource Interface to represent a resource that is stored on the repository.
SimulationService An API that can be used to implement a simulator to simulate handler execution.
StatisticsCollector An interface to be implemented by a statistics collector.
TransactionManager This describes a an instance of the manager class that can be used to manage transactions on the back-end database.
 

Class Summary
ActionConstants Action Constants, used to define actions associated with registry resources when defining permissions.
Activity Representation of a activity that has been performed on the repository.
Aspect Deprecated. This is been in registry for so long.
Association Deprecated.
GhostResource<T> This class contains a reference to a resource that will be dynamically populated into the cache.
RepositoryConstants Constants used in the registry which are exposed to be used in APIs + used across packages.
ResourcePath This class represents resource paths used inside the embedded registry.
Tag Deprecated. This is a social aspect and should not be in repository.
TaggedResourcePath Deprecated. This is a social aspect and should not be in repository.
